short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you automatically replay (loop) videos on Youtube, Dailymotion and other sites that use HTML5

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser action button should appear on the right of the URL bar.
Click the action button once to toggle automatic replay for the video; click twice to disable it.
